fields.title: Recycling - Art Mission
fields.action: Make art with your garbage
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, we almost lost everything on my planet because all the stuff we were buying was producing too much C02. Our greatest artists decided to use only recycled material to inspire us to change.

fields.title: Recycling - Learning Reading Mission
fields.action: Learn about plastic symbols for recycling. What in your house has a '1' or '2' symbols?
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, Earth has a lot of strange symbols on materials to communicate what can be recycled. On my planet we learnt not to buy things that can't be recycled

fields.title: Recycling - Fridge Mission
fields.action: Organize your fridge to reduce waste
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, us Zerons decided to organize food storage as a community so things don't go to waste. Can you show me a well-ordered fridge on Earth?

fields.title: Recycling - Tracking Mission
fields.action: Track your recycling by placing a Carbon0 sign near your recycle bin.
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, to be honest my memory isn't the best so I learnt to use reminders to help me recycle.

fields.title: Recycling - Gifting Mission
fields.action: Give away something you don't need
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on our planet we believe the best gift you can give someone is something upcycled, recycled or don't need anymore

fields.title: Diet - Learning Mission
fields.action: What is your favorite low carbon emission food?
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, Zerons loved eating Wagl, but making Wagl produces a lot of CO2, so our food scientists came up with food that tastes similar and produced less C02. Can you show me your favorite low carbon emission food?

fields.title: Diet - Track Your Cooking Mission
fields.action: Commit to cooking a low carbon emission meal once a week
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, I'm a famous chef on my planet cooking low carbon tasty food. Can you show me Earth meals? By changing your diet in 1 meal a week you can reduce your carbon by 4.7%.

fields.title: Diet - Grow Indoor Veggies
fields.action: Grow your own food
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, it I'm amazed that on earth you can grow some of your food indoors. Please show me!

fields.title: Utilities - Learning Reading Mission
fields.action: Which renewable energy works best for where you live?
fields.learn_more: I'm EL, the science minister. To save our planet everyone learnt about innovations in energy and how to prevent the excessive creation of C02. Can you show me which renewable energy works best for where you live

fields.title: Utilities - Reminder Mission
fields.action: Make a sign from recycled materials to remind you to turn off lights before you go to bed to and put it somewhere you will see it easily
fields.learn_more: I'm EL, not all light bulbs on Earth are the same. Incandescent lightbulbs are very wasteful, fluorescent lights take a lot of electricity to start so turn them off only if you will be gone for more than 15 minutes; LEDs are very efficient!

fields.title: Offset - Video Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn what a Circular Economy is and create a symbol that reminds you of the concept.
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, I'm the Economics Minister on my planet. We've learnt to make money work for our planet. I hear on Earth you call this the Circular Economy

fields.title: Offset - Company Mission
fields.action: Learn which companies are helping save the planet. Which product do you like from one of these companies?
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, when things got dangerous on our planet all Zeros stopped buying or working for companies that didn't care for the planet and this forced companies to change!

fields.title: Offset - Listening Mission
fields.action: Subscribe to one of these podcasts about technology that is helping to save the planet. Which technology or company impressed you the most?
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, the more I learn about innovations on Earth the more confident I am that you too can save your planet!

fields.title: Offset - Browser Plugin
fields.action: Add browser plugins that offset carbon at no cost to you and share these with friends
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, I'm impressed with these ideas that help you save the planet with one or two clicks of this device called a mouse?!?

fields.title: Transport - Learning Video Mission
fields.action: Which of the lowest emission transportation modes makes sense for where you live?
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, our planet is 3 times bigger than Earth. We learned we could minimize our carbon emissions by being smart about how we get around.

fields.title: Transport - Motivation
fields.action: Find and download a free app that will motivate you to walk more.
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, I've learned it's very healthy for humans to walk . Just remember that how you replenish your calories matters too.

fields.title: Offset - Fashion Video
fields.action: Check out innovation in fashion that reduce your carbon footprint. Would you buy a kit that would let you grow your own carbon absorbing cloths?
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, Zerons can change their shape so we don't really use clothing. It's fascinating to think humans could have clothing that absorb carbon emission.

fields.title: Transport - Track your feet powered transport Reminder
fields.action: Commit to using your feet instead of a car once a week and place a carbon0 sign near your door to track your actions.
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, Zerons can change shape so we can just turn ourselves into a wheel and roll! By using your feet once a week instead of a car you can reduce your footprint by 3.5%.

fields.title: Transport - Reading learning mission
fields.action: Which of the lowest emission transportation modes makes sense for where you live?
fields.learn_more: I'm Gogo, our planet is 3 times bigger than Earth. We learned we could minimize our carbon emissions by being smart about how we get around.

fields.title: Offset - Change your search
fields.action: Watch a video about Ecosia the search engine that plants trees
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, on our planet we look at the real cost for anything that is create and the companies that create products are required to replenish these costs. It's great that some companies are trying to move in that way.

fields.title: Offset - Listening Mission 2
fields.action: Subscribe and listen to a podcast about business leaders talking about climate change. What did you learn?
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, on our planet all businesses focus on 3 things: Financial, Social, Environmental. I hope more earth businesses do that too.

fields.title: Offset - Reading Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn what is a Circular Economy. Tell us how can that help the planet?
fields.learn_more: I'm Coi, I'm the Economics Minister on my planet. We've learnt to make money work for our planet. I hear on Earth you call this the Circular Economy.

fields.title: Diet - Grow Veggie Garden
fields.action: Grow your own food
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, it took me some time to learn to grow things on my planet. I wonder how it works on Earth? Please show me!

fields.title: Diet - Grow Microgreens
fields.action: Grow your own food
fields.learn_more: I'm Yum, on my planet Growing your own food is a spectator sport like Earth's Olympics

fields.title: Recycling - Pandemic Proof Yard Sale Mission
fields.action: Create a yard sale with stuff you don't want
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on my planet the best parties would be were we exchanged things we don't need anymore and got to know our neighbors, I'm excited to see how this works on Earth!

fields.title: Recycling - Video Learning Mission
fields.action: Learn about plastic symbols for recycling. What in your house has a '1' or '2' symbol?
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on our planet we minimize use of materials that are not friendly to animals or the environment.  Many Earth animals are harmed because of plastic so I hope we can help you change that.

fields.title: Recycling - Plastic Wrap Alternative
fields.action: Find the alternative to plastic wrap that works best for you
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on my planet we learnt that simple constraints could create whole new opportunities that helped save us. What would you use if plastic wrap didn't exist?

fields.title: Utilities - Learning Video Mission
fields.action: Which renewable energy works best for where you live?
fields.learn_more: I'm Reu, on our planet we have very strong winds almost everywhere and we use that to create electricity.

fields.title: Utilities - Tracking mission.
fields.action: Use the Carbon0 sign to remind you to use appliances in non peak hours and track your.
fields.learn_more: Commit to using washer/driver and dishwasher in off peak hours to reduce your emissions by 1%! Off peak hours can be different based location and time of year. Usually its 10:00 - 4:00 but check with your local company.

fields.title: Utilities - Check Appliances
fields.action: Are any of your appliances the most energy efficient?
fields.learn_more: I'm impresses with the energy star appliances get on earth. On my planet no one purchased appliances that were not efficient.

fields.title: Utilities - Insulation
fields.action: Let us know if your house is insulated well?
fields.learn_more: Earth can get very hot and very cold, my planet is more mild. That's why so much of your carbon footprint can be reduced by strong insulation of your house.

fields.title: Transport - Car Emissions
fields.action: Is your car a low emissions vehicle  (less then 100g per km)?
fields.learn_more: Zerons can change their shape into wheels but on earth many people use cars. Is your car efficient? Use calculator to check.
